mapper.select: SELECT ASSETCODE, ASSETNAME, acquisitionDate, ACCOUNTNAME, CLIENTNAME, SANGGAKWAY, ACQUISITIONPRICE, SLIPNUMBER, RESIDUALVALUE, JUKYO, COMPANYCODE, sanggakCode, depreciation, purchaseCode, accumulated, serviceLife, depreciationRate, disposalDate, disposalPrice, jangbu FROM asset

SELECT ASSETCODE, ASSETNAME, acquisitionDate, ACCOUNTNAME, CLIENTNAME, SANGGAKWAY, ACQUISITIONPRICE, SLIPNUMBER, RESIDUALVALUE, JUKYO, COMPANYCODE, sanggakCode, depreciation, purchaseCode, accumulated, serviceLife, jangbu, depreciationRate FROM ASSET WHERE ASSETCODE = #{assetCode}
mapper.insert: insert into asset (assetCode, acquisitionDate,sanggakWay, purchaseCode,acquisitionPrice) values (#{assetCode},#{acquisitionDate},#{sanggakWay},#{purchaseCode},#{acquisitionPrice})
mapper.update: update asset set assetName = #{assetName}, acquisitionDate = #{acquisitionDate}, sanggakWay = #{sanggakWay}, accountName = #{accountName}, clientName = #{clientName}, acquisitionPrice = #{acquisitionPrice}, residualvalue = #{residualvalue}, jukyo = #{jukyo}, sanggakCode = #{sanggakCode}, depreciation = #{depreciation}, accumulated = nvl(#{accumulated, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null), purchaseCode = #{purchaseCode}, serviceLife = #{serviceLife}, depreciationRate = #{depreciationRate} where assetCode = #{assetCode}
mapper.delete: delete from asset where assetCode = nvl(#{assetCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null)
mapper.select: select ASSETCODE, ASSETNAME, acquisitionDate, ACCOUNTNAME, CLIENTNAME, SANGGAKWAY, ACQUISITIONPRICE, SLIPNUMBER, RESIDUALVALUE, JUKYO, COMPANYCODE, sanggakCode, depreciation, purchaseCode, accumulated, serviceLife, depreciationRate from asset where assetCode like '%' || #{assetCode} || '%'

select ASSETCODE, ASSETNAME, acquisitionDate, ACCOUNTNAME, CLIENTNAME, SANGGAKWAY, ACQUISITIONPRICE, SLIPNUMBER, RESIDUALVALUE, JUKYO, COMPANYCODE, sanggakCode, depreciation, purchaseCode, accumulated, serviceLife, depreciationRate as all_slip from asset where to_date(acquisitionDate,'yy/mm/dd') between to_date(#{acquisitionDate},'yy') and to_date(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd') and accountName like '%' || #{accountName} || '%'
